thread.title: Accountingfly Acquires Going Concern, a Leading Accounting News Publication
thread.title_full: Accountingfly Acquires Going Concern, a Leading Accounting News Publication

author: Jeff Phillips
title: Accountingfly Acquires Going Concern, a Leading Accounting News Publication
text:
Accountingfly, the accounting profession’s online career community, today announced the acquisition of Going Concern, a leading accounting news publication. The publication will continue to operate independently and Founding Editor Caleb Newquist will maintain his position as Editor in Chief, as well as becoming the new head of content for Accountingfly. “Joining forces with Going Concern means we have more opportunities to provide meaningful content to accountants earlier in their careers,” said Jeff Phillips, CEO for Accountingfly. “It also helps accounting employers because employers are looking for new ways to connect with talent. Going Concern has a large and highly engaged audience of early career accountants, and we want to introduce those accountants to our clients, who are some of the very best employers in the profession. Accountingfly’s employers are really excited about the opportunity to reach this audience.”
Going Concern provides an alternative take on breaking news and developing stories in accounting. It features original editorial content and an insider analysis of the culture, people and firms shaping the profession. Going Concern is formerly a member of Sift Media’s family of sites. Sift Media is also a publisher of AccountingWEB, a leading website in the CPA market, providing practical and thought provoking content to the accounting community.
"We believe Accountingfly is the perfect new home for Going Concern and a great alignment," said Tom Dunkerley, Managing Director of Sift Media. "We've been really impressed with Jeff and his team at Accountingfly, and we're confident that they will give Going Concern the focus it deserves and make it an even bigger success. As a result of this sale, we’ll be able to invest further resource and energy into building the AccountingWEB brand and audience, globally.
For more information about Accountingfly, visit https://accountingfly.com .
About Accountingfly
Accountingfly is the accounting profession’s online career community. Employers use Accountingfly to streamline the recruitment and hiring process of interns, early career and experienced accountants. Candidates create profiles to search for and apply to jobs, and have the option of making their profile private or visible to recruiters. Along the way, Accountingfly provides support and resources to accountants help ensure a successful career.
About Sift Media
Sift Media is a leading business-to-business publisher specialising in online professional communities and face-to-face business events. With a range of services including websites, email publications, industry awards and exhibitions, Sift Media delivers original, branded content to over one million professionals every month, across finance, accounting, HR and training, IT, marketing, customer management and knowledge management. This includes AccountingWEB.com and AccountingWEB.co.uk.
